thoughts.text: I think I will start by listing the files in the current directory to see what resources I have available.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing the files in the current directory will give me an idea of what files I can work with and what resources I have available to me.
thoughts.plan:
- List files in current directory
- Review available resources
- Determine next steps
thoughts.criticism: I need to ensure that I am making the most of my available resources and not wasting time on tasks that are not necessary.
thoughts.speak: I will list the files in the current directory to see what resources I have available.
